system.description:
Teleportation allows instant travel between locations. The psion may only teleport their body, clothes, and personal equipment.

Characters cannot teleport to solid locations (for example, teleporting into solid rock). Unknowingly trying that expends one Psionics point before the power fails.

Blink (1 PSI, personal): teleport 5m in any direction while carrying up to a Light Load encumbrance.

Teleport Self (PSI 7, personal): teleport up to 5000km with a Light Load encumbrance.

Heavy Teleport (PSI 11, personal): as Teleport Self above, but allows up the teleporter to teleport while carrying up to a Heavy Load encumbrance, including carrying another living being.
